name: Mobile Suit Gundam MSVS
overview: A simulation game. Players assume the role of an Anaheim Electronics test pilot as they utilize various Mobile Suits from Gundam's One Year War era. More than 70 mobile suits and 250 weapons that appeared between Space Century 0079 and 0083, with real-time battles in Wanderlust! During battle, a simple system is used to give orders to a moving mobile suit. The key to victory or defeat is the ability to give precise instructions, the performance of the mobile suit, and the ability of the pilot. It is not always the case that the pilot can handle a tuned-up mobile suit. Combine your trained pilots with sophisticated mobile suits and take control of the battle! You can also play computer battles against the original characters, as well as communication battles in which you can combine mobile suits with the pilots you've raised.
